page.title: 13HEMBURY WOODS CONT.FROM P.12
page.content: The unwanted plants will be cut back to reveal the pathways.The present pathway is a single track and they are trying to make a loop giving a more interesting walk.The car park is to be properly surfaced and posts driven into the ground to restrict cars to the proper area.{HEMBURY {CASTLE}has been overgrown with unwanted trees and plants.The trees will be cut down to reveal the castle. The {RIVER DART}flows through these woods and tends to wear away the banks.This work will be carried out by the{NATIONAL TRUST.}On our visit we came across three types of flower.{ {BLUEBELLS,PRIMROSES}and{RHODODENDRONS} and amongst the insects were{ {POND-SKATERS}and{WOOD ANTS.
